titleStmt.title: A faithful testimony for God & my country, or, A retro-spective glass for the legislators and the rest of the sons of the Church of England (so called), who are found persecuting the innocent
titleStmt.author: Billing, Edward, 1623-1686.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Billing. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
